comments.author: Lawton Campbell.8517
comments.body:
Cire Lionheart.5318:

Hello, really enjoying using the API.
I was tapping into the inventory/bank but some people are getting 404 errors. Those who were have purchased additional bank slots. Could there be an issue or is it just my programming error?

Could I be passing too many ID’s at once?

Dunno. Could you PM me the full request URL (including the API key) that’s returning the error?

comments.author: Eearslya.6309
comments.body:
smiley.1438:

Seems like accounts with 9+ (<256 slots) bank tabs are affected. Can anyone confirm?

Yeah, I have 9 bank tabs exactly (in-game).

comments.author: smiley.1438
comments.body: Hmm, that’s weird. For me it’s still fine (8 bank tabs, 240 slots). Seems like accounts with 9+ (<256 slots) bank tabs are affected. Can anyone confirm? (https://forum-en.guildwars2.com/forum/community/api/Launching-inventory-endpoints/first#post5212876)

comments.author: Eearslya.6309
comments.body: Yeah, they’re very right. According to my database, this started happening yesterday around 3PM. After the first bank slot, there’s a ton of invalid nulls before it shows the rest of my bank. …Funny enough, it’s exactly 256 nulls, the same number as the last issue we had with the bank.

comments.author: spaeda.8419
comments.body:
Same thing, I have 372 nulls return instead of 2
2 possibilities :
1. Api bug
2. Anet offer me a lot of bank slot extension

comments.author: fro.8967
comments.body: I think those are just the empty slots.

comments.author: AfterXII.2761
comments.body:
Anet,

Your bank/inventory apis are spewing out a ton of nulls where theyre not supposed to. Please fix.

EDIT: Looks like this got resolved. Thanks guys!
